claims.claim: Intratumoral mRNA vaccination broadens the MHC-I immunopeptidome landscape.

evidence.quote: Fraction of tumor proteins represented in immunopeptidome
Fraction of proteins represented in MHC-I peptidome

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.

claims.claim: Prior SARS-CoV-2 mRNA vaccination is associated with improved survival in metastatic patients receiving ICI.

evidence.quote: Retrospective human survival comparison p-value | p=0.01
Vaccinated subgroup had improved survival under ICI treatment

claims.caveat: The human analysis is retrospective and non-randomized; residual confounding is likely.

claims.claim: The sensitization effect is dependent on type I interferon signaling.

evidence.quote: Blocking type I interferon signaling with anti-IFNAR1 eliminated the observed sensitization benefit.
Type I interferon response score (normalized units) | 3.1 | 1.0

claims.caveat: Some mechanistic readouts were strongest in specific model systems rather than uniformly across all tested settings.

claims.claim: mRNA vaccination increases PD-L1 expression in tumor tissue, making it more targetable.

evidence.quote: PD-L1 expression fold-change in tumor tissue | 2.4x | 1.0x

claims.caveat: Mouse model effects may not map one-to-one to all human tumors.
